name: cifti-smoothing
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Smooth a cifti file.

The input cifti file must have a brain models mapping on the chosen dimension, columns for .dtseries, and either for .dconn.  By default, data in different structures is smoothed independently (i.e., "parcel constrained" smoothing), so volume structures that touch do not smooth across this boundary.  Specify -merged-volume to ignore these boundaries.  Surface smoothing uses the GEO_GAUSS_AREA smoothing method.

The -*-corrected-areas options are intended for when it is unavoidable to smooth on group average surfaces, it is only an approximate correction for the reduction of structure in a group average surface.  It is better to smooth the data on individuals before averaging, when feasible.

The -fix-zeros-* options will treat values of zero as lack of data, and not use that value when generating the smoothed values, but will fill zeros with extrapolated values.  The ROI should have a brain models mapping along columns, exactly matching the mapping of the chosen direction in the input file.  Data outside the ROI is ignored.

inputs.name: surface_kernel
inputs.description: the size of the gaussian surface smoothing kernel in mm, as sigma by default

inputs.name: volume_kernel
inputs.description: the size of the gaussian volume smoothing kernel in mm, as sigma by default

inputs.name: direction
inputs.description: which dimension to smooth along, ROW or COLUMN

inputs.name: opt_fwhm
inputs.description: kernel sizes are FWHM, not sigma

inputs.name: left_surface
inputs.description: specify the left surface to use

type.name: left_surface
type.description: specify the left surface to use

inputs.name: opt_left_corrected_areas_area_metric
inputs.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the left surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

inputs.name: right_surface
inputs.description: specify the right surface to use

type.name: right_surface
type.description: specify the right surface to use

inputs.name: opt_right_corrected_areas_area_metric
inputs.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the right surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

inputs.name: cerebellum_surface
inputs.description: specify the cerebellum surface to use

type.name: cerebellum_surface
type.description: specify the cerebellum surface to use

inputs.name: opt_cerebellum_corrected_areas_area_metric
inputs.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the cerebellum surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

inputs.name: opt_cifti_roi_roi_cifti
inputs.description: smooth only within regions of interest: the regions to smooth within, as a cifti file

inputs.name: opt_fix_zeros_volume
inputs.description: treat values of zero in the volume as missing data

inputs.name: opt_fix_zeros_surface
inputs.description: treat values of zero on the surface as missing data
